name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D重大告知】VTuber人生を教科書にして #しくじりかなたそ 先生爆誕！！【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [fm9yOM9knZo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Kanata explains how she initially tried to debut with a 'cool character' image, using Okayu as a reference.
The group discusses memories of their debut streams; Okayu notes she is now in her 7th year.
Kanata describes the immense pressure she felt after a successful start in Hololive.
Lamy shares her painful experiences with negative debut comments and the pressure of following senior generations.
Okayu recalls a more relaxed atmosphere during her debut era when the viewer base was smaller.
Kanata introduces her 'Dark Age'—a period shortly after her debut where her efforts backfired.
Kanata explains how her struggle to multitask during the ARK craze led to awkward on-stream behavior.
Okayu mentions that Kanata was normal off-stream, which made her on-stream persona even more baffling to colleagues.
Kanata reveals the harsh comments she received from listeners during her 'Dark Age'.

subtitles.original: それでっ！
subtitles.english: And so!

subtitles.original: やっぱり参考にしていたのはおかゆ先輩...
subtitles.english:
As I thought, the one I used as a reference
was Okayu-senpai...

subtitles.original: わぁ〜
subtitles.english: Wow~

subtitles.original: これはもう本当に間違いがなくね...
subtitles.english: There's no mistake about that...

subtitles.original: いや〜ありがたいね、ね？
subtitles.english: Man, I'm honored. Right?

subtitles.original: まぁクールぶっていたけど、なんかダサいらしいパワーポイントを駆使して
subtitles.english:
I was acting cool, but while using what was
apparently tacky PowerPoints...

subtitles.original: 今後の迷走を予感させる配信となってしまいました。
subtitles.english:
...it became a stream that foreshadowed
my future identity crisis.

subtitles.original: でもみんなも初配信はあるということで、皆さんどうですか？
subtitles.english:
But since everyone has a debut stream,
how about you guys?

subtitles.original: 自分の初配信覚えてますか？おかゆ先輩！
subtitles.english:
Do you remember your own debut stream,
Okayu-senpai?

subtitles.original: 覚えてますよ。
subtitles.english: I remember it.

subtitles.original: まぁ若かった。
subtitles.english: Well, I was young.

subtitles.original: 今も若いですよ！
subtitles.english: You're still young now!

subtitles.original: もう7年目かな？
subtitles.english: Is it my 7th year already?

subtitles.original: 7年の経過と思うと、それは確かに時間が経って大人になっているか...
subtitles.english:
Thinking about the passage of 7 years,
you've definitely grown up...

subtitles.original: それは感じるかな。
subtitles.english: I do feel that.

subtitles.original: そう、デビュー配信も僕も終わり、ダサいと言われつつも、1週間後に先程夢で掲げました登録者5万人を達成し、
subtitles.english:
Right. My debut stream ended, and despite
being called tacky, a week later I reached

subtitles.original: 1週間後に先程夢で掲げました登録者5万人を達成し、
subtitles.english:
the 50,000 subscribers I mentioned dreaming
of earlier.

subtitles.original: 出だしは非常に順調だったんですが...
subtitles.english: The start was extremely smooth, but...

subtitles.original: 僕はこういう気持ちを抱くようになります。次のページ。
subtitles.english: I started to feel this way. Next page.

subtitles.original: プレッシャーだな
subtitles.english: What pressure...

subtitles.original: わかる〜
subtitles.english: I get it~

subtitles.original: やっぱりホロライブというところに所属させていただいたことによる、リスナーさん数字とかってあったので、
subtitles.english:
After all, belonging to Hololive brought expectations
regarding viewers and numbers.

subtitles.original: 特にそのデビューして何もしてないから、いいのかな？これでっていうのを感じたりしましたね。
subtitles.english:
Since I'd just debuted and hadn't done anything,
I wondered if it was really okay like this.

subtitles.original: 皆さんはこうデビューしたての時ってどうでしたか？
subtitles.english: What was it like for you all when you first debuted?

subtitles.original: ラミィはもうそれこそ4期生が盛り上がってるところでデビューしたので、
subtitles.english:
For me, I debuted right when the 4th generation
was reaching peak excitement,

subtitles.original: プレッシャーもすごかったし、結構批判的な意見も多かった。
subtitles.english:
so the pressure was immense, and there
were many critical opinions.

subtitles.original: え〜、どんな？
subtitles.english: Oh, like what?

subtitles.original: いやもう、あの...ゴキブリの5期生とか...
subtitles.english: Well, things like... "Cockroaches of the 5th gen"...
Ehh~~!!

subtitles.original: ひどいよ！
subtitles.english: That's terrible!

subtitles.original: 「才能なし」みたいな。
subtitles.english: Things like "no talent."

subtitles.original: すごい言われましたよ。
subtitles.english: I was told that a lot.

subtitles.original: でもやっぱりこう先輩が築き上げてきたものに乗っかってる感じだったので...
subtitles.english:
But I felt like I was just riding on the success
that our seniors had built up...

subtitles.original: 気持ちはわかる。
subtitles.english: I know the feeling.

subtitles.original: プレッシャーがすごかった。
subtitles.english: The pressure was incredible.

subtitles.original: おかゆ先輩あった？プレッシャー。
subtitles.english: Did you have pressure, Okayu-senpai?

subtitles.original: いや僕が入った時はもうそんなね、まだまだ人も少なくて、
subtitles.english: No, when I joined, there weren't that many people yet,

subtitles.original: 大空スバル選手権の前日に大空スバルのモノマネの練習をするだけで1時間枠取ったりしてたから...
subtitles.english:
so I'd do an hour-long stream just practicing
Subaru impressions the day before the Subaru Championship...

subtitles.original: プレッシャー感じなくていいからマジで！
subtitles.english: You seriously don't need to feel pressure!

subtitles.original: 古き良きホロライブを感じますね。
subtitles.english: I feel the good old days of Hololive.

subtitles.original: そんなこともありましたよ。
subtitles.english: Things like that happened too.

subtitles.original: 僕もやっぱりデビュー直後だったので、特に先輩たちにも恩返ししたいとかリスナーさんにも何かとか、
subtitles.english:
I was also right after my debut, so I was thinking
a lot about giving back to my seniors and fans.

subtitles.original: そういうことをすごく考えていました。
subtitles.english: I was constantly thinking about those things.

subtitles.original: そしてこの考えが悪い方に働いてしまい、その結果僕はこうなってしまいます。次のページ。
subtitles.english:
And this mindset ended up backfiring,
leading to this. Next page.

subtitles.original: 暗黒の初期かなた時代
subtitles.english: The Dark Age of early Kanata

subtitles.original: 暗黒ですか。
subtitles.english: A Dark Age?

subtitles.original: 暗黒...
subtitles.english: Dark...

subtitles.original: もうとんでもない暗黒の時代でした。
subtitles.english: It was an absolute Dark Age.

subtitles.original: 初期かなたがどんな感じだったのか、デビュー当時の状況を説明しますと、
subtitles.english:
To explain what early Kanata was like,
here's the situation at the time of my debut.

subtitles.original: 当時はARKというゲームが大流行しておりまして、
subtitles.english: At the time, the game ARK was incredibly popular,

subtitles.original: 流行ってた！流行ってた！
subtitles.english: It was! Everyone was playing it!

subtitles.original: みんなやってたもんね。
subtitles.english: Everyone was playing it back then.

subtitles.original: 僕はゲームに慣れてなかったんで、ゲームもワタワタしつつコラボもしつつ、
subtitles.english:
I wasn't used to gaming, so I was flustered
while playing and collaborating,

subtitles.original: 喋りもいっぱい頑張って、でもコメントも拾わなきゃと全部やろうとしたら...
subtitles.english:
and trying to talk and read comments all at once.
When I tried to do everything...

subtitles.original: 先輩が喋ってるのにコメントを読んだりとか、空気が読めていない「初期かなた」誕生と。
subtitles.english:
...I'd read comments while my seniors were
talking. Thus, the socially awkward "Early Kanata"
was born.

subtitles.original: ああ...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 焦りから異常に空気が読めてないのに無駄に積極的に話しかけてくる、
subtitles.english:
Unable to read the room due to nerves,
yet aggressively trying to talk to everyone,

subtitles.original: だる絡みの初期かなた。
subtitles.english: it was the annoying early Kanata.

subtitles.original: これね、結構見てたんだけど、ちょっと苦しくなる。
subtitles.english:
I watched quite a bit of that,
but it's actually painful to see.

subtitles.original: 胸がキュッてなる。
subtitles.english: It makes my heart sink.

subtitles.original: 共感性羞恥と、あぁこの子っていう。
subtitles.english:
It's a mix of secondhand embarrassment
and feeling bad for her.

subtitles.original: その悪意がないのは多分伝わるので、キュッとなる系ではありますね。
subtitles.english:
Since there's no malice, it's just painful
to watch her try so hard.

subtitles.original: 頑張ろうとしてた感じが。
subtitles.english: Like, she was trying her best.

subtitles.original: おかゆ先輩、初期かなた時代の僕って覚えてますか？
subtitles.english:
Okayu-senpai, do you remember me from
my early days?

subtitles.original: いや僕実は、ARKって1回ぐらいしか参加してないから。
subtitles.english: Actually, I only participated in ARK about once.

subtitles.original: だから配信中のかなたんより、配信してないかなたんと関わる方が多かったんです。
subtitles.english:
So I actually spent more time with you
off-stream than watching your streams.

subtitles.original: 配信してないかなたんは今とあんまり変わんないと思う。
subtitles.english:
Off-stream Kanatan was pretty much the same
as you are now.

subtitles.original: そうなんです。実は配信外では普通だったので。
subtitles.english: Exactly. I was actually normal off-stream.

subtitles.original: なんで配信中はこんなおかしくて、裏では普通に話せるのに
subtitles.english:
The other Holo-members even asked me,
"Why are you so weird on stream

subtitles.original: 「あんたなんでなの？」っていうのをホロメンに言われたこともありました。
subtitles.english: when you're so normal in person?"

subtitles.original: 初期かなたを見たリスナーの反応はと言うと、次のページ。
subtitles.english:
As for the listeners' reactions to early Kanata...
Next page.

subtitles.original: 「推しに絡まないで欲しい！」「早く辞めろ」
subtitles.english:
"Don't get involved with my oshi!"
"Quit already!"

subtitles.original: もちろん応援してくれる人もたくさんいたんですけど、
subtitles.english:
Of course, there were plenty of people
supporting me too, but...

subtitles.original: 実はこれ、配信開始をする前、待機所の状態でコメントが大荒れしたこともあって...
subtitles.english:
Actually, even before the stream started,
the waiting room chat would be in an uproar...
